terrain.name: Bush
terrain.description: After you end your turn in a space with a bush, you may test Wit; 2.  If you pass, become hidden.

terrain.name: Boulder
terrain.description: If you test to negate damage or fear while in a space with a boulder, you may convert 1 fate to 1 success.

terrain.name: Wall
terrain.description: Spaces separated by a wall are not adjacent to (or nearby) each other.

terrain.name: Stream
terrain.description:
After a hero moves through a stream, their turn ends.
After an enemy moves through a stream, their activation ends.

terrain.name: Fire Pit
terrain.description: If you attack while in a space with a fire pit, you may discard a card with fate from the test to add pierce or smite.

terrain.name: Statue
terrain.description:
You may interact with a statue to test Might; 2.  If you pass, apply 4 hits and sunder to an enemy in your space and discard the statue.
Interacting with a statue does not provoke attacks.

terrain.name: Barrels
terrain.description:
You may interact with barrels to test Wisdom; 2.  If you pass, apply 4 hits and stun to a nearby enemy and discard the barrels.
Interacting with barrels does not provoke attacks.

terrain.name: Table
terrain.description:
You may interact with a table to test Spirit; 1.  If you pass, gain 1 inspiration and become emboldened.
Interacting with a table does not provoke attacks.

terrain.name: Pit
terrain.description: After you move into a space with a pit, test Agility; 2.  If you fail, suffer 2 damage.

terrain.name: Mist
terrain.description:
If you would suffer damage while in a space with mist, that damage is suffered facedown.
When you attack an enemy that is in a space with mist, you cannot convert fate to success.

terrain.name: Rubble
terrain.description:
While in a space with rubble, you may use the rubble as an equipped item.
1 success: 2 hits
2 success: 1 hits, pierce
Test stat: Wit
Ranged

terrain.name: Web
terrain.description: When you would move out of a space with a web, test Might; 1.  If you fail, forfeit that movement instead.

terrain.name: Log
terrain.description:
You may interact with a log to test Agility; 1.  If you pass, gain 1 inspiration and become determined.
Interacting with a log does not provoke attacks.

terrain.name: Elevation
terrain.description:
While a figure is in a space with elevation, their Ranged attacks can target a figure 1 additional space away.
Figures in a space with elevation are in range only if the attacker is in a space with elevation.

terrain.name: Trench
terrain.description:
After a hero moves through a trench, they suffer 2 facedown damage.
After an enemy moves through a trench, apply 2 hits to that enemy. (This may change the enemy attack.)

terrain.name: Fence
terrain.description:
When you would move through a fence, test Agility; 1.  If you fail, forfeit that movement instead.
After an enemy moves through a fence their movement immediately ends (even if this prevents reaching their target.)

terrain.name: Chest
terrain.description: You may interact with a chest to test Wisdom; 2.  If you pass, discard the chest and lore increases by 4.

terrain.name: Barricade
terrain.description: Heroes and enemies cannot move into this space (unless they can ignore terrain).

terrain.name: Fountain
terrain.description:
If you would suffer fear while in a space with a fountain, that fear is suffered facedown.
If you test to negate damage or fear while in a space with a fountain, you may reveal 1 additional card.

terrain.name: Pond
terrain.description:
At the start of your turn, if you are in a space with a pond, gain 1 inspiration.
After you move into a space with a pond, test Spirit; 2.  If you fail, you cannot move out of that space this turn.

space.name: Darkness
space.description:
During the darkness step of the shadow phase, each hero that is in darkness suffers an amount of fear indicated by the app.
(Typically 2 fear, Spirit negates.)

space.name: Difficult Ground
space.description: When a hero moves into a space with difficult ground, that hero can discard one prepared card. If they do not discard a card, they cannot move out of that space this turn.

space.name: Fortified
space.description:
A hero cannot move out of a fortified space if there are more enemy figures than hero figures in that space, including the hero who is moving.
An enemy group cannot move out of a fortified space if there are more hero figures than enemy figures in that space, including the enemy group that is moving.

modifiers.name: Pierce
modifiers.description: This attack ignores the enemy's armor.

modifiers.name: Smite
modifiers.description: This attack ignores the enemy's sorcery.

modifiers.name: Sunder
modifiers.description: This attack permanently reduces the enemy's armor by one (before hits are applied).

modifiers.name: Cleave
modifiers.description: Each enemy in the group suffers the full number of hits.

modifiers.name: Lethal
modifiers.description: If this attack reduces the enemy's current health by at least half, the enemy is defeated.

modifiers.name: Stun
modifiers.description: This attack exhausts the enemy group. If the group is elite, it also cannot counterattack this attack.

keywords.name: Scout X
keywords.description: When an effect instructs you to 'Scout X,' reveal X cards from the top of your skill deck. You may prepare one of those cards (place it faceup under your hero card). Then, place each of the remaining revealed cards on the top or bottom of your skill deck in any order.

keywords.name: Strike X
keywords.description: During your attack test, you may discard a card that has the 'Strike X' keyword to add X hits to the attack.

keywords.name: Guard X
keywords.description: When you or a hero in your space would suffer damage or fear, you may discard a card that has the 'Guard X' keyword to prevent any combination of X damage and fear.

keywords.name: Sprint X
keywords.description: During your turn, you can discard a card that has the 'Sprint X' keyword to move X additional spaces. You can perform actions between each movement.

keywords.name: Rest X
keywords.description: At the end of your turn, you can discard a card that has the 'Rest X' keyword to discard any combination of X of your facedown damage or fear cards

keywords.name: Hide X
keywords.description: After performing a test, you can discard a card that has the 'Hide' keyword to gain a 'Hidden' boon card.
